title: SC EP:653 Collecting A Specimen With Matt Pruitt
itunes:title: SC EP:653 Collecting A Specimen With Matt Pruitt
description: Matt Pruitt joins us tonight and discusses collecting a specimen and determining the value of evidence. Matt is apart of The North American Wood Ape Conservancy. The group is trying to actively collect a specimen. For more information check out the North American Wood Ape Conservancy.
content:encoded: Matt Pruitt joins us tonight and discusses collecting a specimen and determining the value of evidence. Matt is apart of The North American Wood Ape Conservancy. The group is trying to actively collect a specimen. For more information check out the North American Wood Ape Conservancy.
itunes:subtitle: Bigfoot Encounter
